About

After almost 4 years of working at rollingpin as a graphic designer & “tech-guy”, I moved to Germany to study 3D Animation & VFX at pixlvisn.

At school there was a large focus on Maya & Nuke, but when I found out about Houdini, I decided to put my free time into learning it, while also improving my skills in Python.
To better improve my Python and MEL skills I wrote some tools for my schoolmates, like a Shader-Changer for Maya (following the switch from mental ray to V-Ray).

You should take a look at my tools and my portfolio.

Currently I’m searching for a job in the 3D industry, film or games.
If you want to get to know me a bit better, just write me a mail.
